name: Arachnid Catacombs
description:
Arachnid Catacombs is a spine-chilling horror game where you take on the role of an arachnologist, exploring a dark and eerie cave. As you delve deeper into the catacombs, you discover a monstrous spider lurking in the shadows, hell-bent on making you its next meal. With three different endings, you must make decisions that could determine your fate. The game even features a spider squishing feature, making the experience all the more realistic and terrifying. Can you escape the Arachnid Catacombs alive?

Key Features:
  • Spider squishing!
  • 3 Endings
  • Creepy Atmosphere
  • Realistic Graphics
  • Horrifying Lighting
  • Interesting storyline
  • Jump scares
Controls:
  • Move - WASD 
  • Flashlight - F
  • Crouch - CTRL
